column2: Your horde swarms into the holding of [From.GetName] as the walls crumble and fall. They are intent on plundering, but won't go ahead unless you, their [Root.GetTitle], give them permission to do so.

Your horde has looted, ravaged, pillaged and plundered [target_location.GetName] to such a degree that a holding in the county has been completely devastated. All that is left is a smattering of rubble among our new grazing lands - our horses will surely like it here!

Your warriors have looted, ravaged, pillaged and plundered [target_location.GetName] to such a degree that a Holding in the county has been completely devastated. Only empty ruins remain, haunted by the shades of the slain...

The settled weaklings that used to hold [new_nomad_province.GetName] have been unable to rein in the free-spirited nomadic people living there. Clan Chief [new_nomad.GetFirstName] and [new_nomad.GetHerHis] [new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]s have decided to join your realm, bending knee to you instead!

As your predecessor was unable to construct enough holdings to rein in the nomadic population of [new_nomad_province.GetName], you had no choice but to see them secede from your realm. [new_nomad.GetFirstName] and [new_nomad.GetHerHis] [new_nomad_province.Culture.GetName]s now rule the area.
Bring back the spoils to me and we will divide them between us!
We will use the corpses to fertilize the fields!
Do not ruin this place - I have other plans for it.
I shall have the skulls of the dead fashioned into a throne.
We shall feast and sacrifice whoever is left in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
